column6: An inexpensive ergonomic keyboard that puts your wrists in the ideal typing position for pleasant typing over long periods.
A fully split mechanical keyboard that can accommodate a wide range of body types and ergonomic needs; it has both Mac and PC layout options.

column3: Kinesis Freestyle2 Blue (Mac); Kinesis Freestyle2 Blue (PC)
column4: Bluetooth for Mac; Bluetooth for Windows
column6: A wireless, split keyboard that works with both macOS and iOS and won't leave your shoulders sore.; A wireless, split keyboard that works with Windows, Android, and Linux and won't leave your shoulders sore.
A must-have accessory for maximum ergonomics with the Freestyle2.
